backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining data types and maps for users, content (glossary, articles, papers, blogs), market data, and chat responses, with maintenance-mode checks and initial chat/utility functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs for blogs UI, navigation updates, and blog React Query hooks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing human-written summaries of many frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme configuration defining OKLCH color variables and dark/light mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file loading the React app and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React root with router setup, pages including blog routes, maintenance gating, and global layout components like header, footer, and chat widget.
frontend/src/components/ChatAssistantWid: Interactive chat widget handling user messages, intent detection, backend calls, disclaimers, and rendering chat UI with source-based responses.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with a NIFTY 50 ticker, determining live vs closed market status client‑side and displaying stock prices accordingly.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements a responsive header with navigation, theme toggle, calculators menu, and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScree: Displays a full‑screen maintenance notice with branding and basic messaging.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity auth, including initialization, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for maintenance mode, admin status, user profiles, stock data, glossary data, and chat interactions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and education philosophy sections using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Displays categorized financial articles with tab navigation and loads articles per category via a query hook.
frontend/src/pages/AtalPensionYojanaCalc: Implements an APY calculator that computes monthly contribution, total contribution, and corpus based on age and desired pension.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a single blog post with metadata, tags, and formatted dates, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Lists all blogs with titles, previews, dates, categories, and tags, including loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CAGRCalculatorPage.ts: Provides a CAGR calculator that computes annual growth rate from initial value, final value, and time period.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Displays categorized lists of financial calculators with icons and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact info and a feedback form that submits user messages via a custom hook.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Shows legal disclaimers about investment risks and clarifies the site provides only educational content.
frontend/src/pages/EMICalculatorPage.tsx: Implements an EMI calculator with inputs for loan details and computed EMI, interest, and repayment.
frontend/src/pages/EPFCalculatorPage.tsx: Calculates EPF contributions and projected balance based on salary, contribution rates, interest, and tenure.
frontend/src/pages/FDCalculatorPage.tsx: Provides a fixed deposit calculator with simple and compound interest options, displaying maturity and interest earned based on user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackAdminPage.tsx: Implements an admin feedback management panel with authentication, search, sorting, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/FixedVsReducingLoanCa: Calculates and compares fixed-rate and reducing-balance loan interest, showing total repayment and interest difference.
frontend/src/pages/GlossaryPage.tsx: Displays a searchable, grouped glossary of financial terms with error handling and reference navigation.
frontend/src/pages/GratuityCalculatorPag: Provides a gratuity calculator using salary and years of service with eligibility checks and formatted output.
frontend/src/pages/GSTCalculatorPage.tsx: Computes GST breakdown including CGST, SGST, total tax, and final amount for a given base value and rate.
frontend/src/pages/HomeLoanEMICalculator: Calculates home loan EMI, total interest, and repayment using principal, rate, and tenure inputs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main landing page with hero content, navigation buttons, and feature cards for learning resources.
frontend/src/pages/HRACalculatorPage.tsx: Implements an HRA tax exemption calculator based on salary, rent, and city type with detailed breakdown.
frontend/src/pages/LearningPage.tsx: Renders financial learning sections from an API with accordion-based content and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LumpSumCalculatorPage: Offers a lump-sum investment calculator using compound interest to show maturity value and gains.
frontend/src/pages/NPSCalculatorPage.tsx: Interactive NPS calculator page that computes projected corpus, annuity amount, and monthly pension based on user inputs.
frontend/src/pages/NSCCalculatorPage.tsx: NSC calculator page that calculates maturity value and interest earned from fixed-rate NSC investments.
frontend/src/pages/PPFCalculatorPage.tsx: PPF calculator page computing total invested amount, interest earned, and maturity value for yearly contributions.
frontend/src/pages/RDCalculatorPage.tsx: RD calculator page estimating maturity amount, total deposits, and interest for recurring monthly investments.
frontend/src/pages/RegulationsPage.tsx: Static regulations page presenting SEBI/RBI guidelines, investor protection info, and fraud awareness through tabbed content.
frontend/src/pages/ResearchPapersPage.ts: Fetches and displays research papers with download links, showing loading and empty states as needed.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleInterestCalcula: A simple interest calculator taking principal, rate, and time to compute interest and total amount.
frontend/src/pages/SimpleVsCompoundInter: A comparison tool that calculates simple and compound interest with configurable compounding frequency and shows the difference.
frontend/src/pages/SIPCalculatorPage.tsx: A SIP calculator page that takes monthly investment, rate, and years, computes future value using compounding, and displays results with input controls.
frontend/src/pages/SSYCalculatorPage.tsx: An SSY calculator allowing yearly investment, child age, and start year to compute deposit years and maturity value using fixed SSY interest.
React page providing step-up SIP calculators using amount or percentage increases with compound growth logic and formatted results.
frontend/src/pages/SWPCalculatorPage.tsx: An SWP calculator that simulates month‑by‑month withdrawals, growth, and remaining balance based on initial investment and return rate.
frontend/src/pages/XIRRCalculatorPage.ts: React page that manages user cash flows and computes XIRR via a Newton-Raphson approximation.
frontend/src/utils/arthSaathiChat.ts: Utility functions for detecting language, intent, and generating refusal messages for the ArthSaathi chat assistant.
frontend/src/utils/glossaryFormatting.ts: Parses glossary definitions to extract main text and 'Also read' references and normalizes term names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, a high‑level platform summary, and a detailed list of existing frontend and backend features including routing, theming, authentication, access control, and maintenance mode.
